title: TypeORM DB Client
description: A database client UI for TypeORM that creates a web-based interface for database exploration

envFile.description: Path to the .env file to load environment variables from

host.description: Database host (defaults to localhost or DB_HOST env var)

port.description: Database port (defaults to 5432 or DB_PORT env var)

httpPort.description: Local port to accept HTTP traffic

username.description: Database username (defaults to postgres or DB_USERNAME/DB_USER env var)

password.description: Database password (defaults to empty or DB_PASSWORD env var)

database.description: Database name (defaults to postgres or DB_DATABASE/DB_NAME env var)

type.description: Database type (defaults to postgres or DB_TYPE env var)
